All Classes

Class
Description
Benchmarker
Used to time the execution duration of a run.
ByteArray
A tester class that uses bytes instead of longs to store vectors of 8-bits.
Code
The definition of a mathematical linear code.
CodeDisplayParameters
A wrapper class containing the information of what should be displayed on console as output.
CodeExporter
Exports the code found to file as a persistent object, \(\LaTeX\) and Matlab files.
CodeExporterParameters
Stores the options of a code when being exported.
CodeObjectIO
Exports the code found to file as a persistent object (.bin file).
CodeOperations
The operations a mathematical linear code.
CodeParameters
Stores the parameters of a code when being created.
CodeStatistics
The code statistics is responsible for benchmarking the statistics run of a code.
CodeValidator
The code validator that will ensure the code that was obtained is valid by checking that the generator matrix, orthogonal linear combinations, minimum distance etc.
CodeValidatorParameters
Stores the options of a code \(\mathsf{C}\) when being validated to ensure the generator matrix \(G\) does satisfy the necessary requirements of the \(\left[n, \, k, \, d\right]_{base}\) code found.
ComplexExecutor
A complete execution class that initializes all possible parameters in this program from the \(n\), \(k\), \(d\) values to the code parameters, code validator parameters, code export parameters and code display parameters.
DirectoryCreator
The creation of directories and files is taken care of here.
Functions
A class contains static variables and methods to be used globally across the classes in this program.
GF4Operations
A way to perform mathematical operations in \(\mathbb{F}_4\).
HammingWeight
A way to find the Hamming weight for vectors in base \(2\) or \(4\).
HammingWeightTester
Ensures the optimal Hamming weight approach used in this program matched the expected result.
InvalidBaseException
An exception that can be thrown when an invalid base is trying to be used.
InvalidCodeParameters
An exception that can be thrown when an invalid code parameters (\(n\) and/or \(k\)) of a code \(\mathsf{C}\) is trying to be used.
InvalidColIndexException
An exception that can be thrown when an invalid column index in some matrix is trying to be accessed.
InvalidColumnDimensionToSetException
An exception that can be thrown when trying to override a specific column in the matrix with a column vector that doesn't match the matrix's dimension.
InvalidColumnVectorDimensionException
An exception that can be thrown when the number of rows in a column vector exceeds the allowable limit.
InvalidDigitException
An exception that can be thrown when an invalid digit is being used in the code.
InvalidIdentityRowIndexException
An exception that can be thrown when an invalid row index is specified in the identity submatrix of the generator matrix \(G\).
InvalidMatricesBases
An exception that can be thrown when the bases of two matrices don't match.
InvalidMatrixDimensionsException
An exception that can be thrown when the dimensions of two matrices don't match for multiplication.
InvalidMinimumDistanceException
An exception that can be thrown when the minimum distance specified is less than \(3\).
InvalidRowIndexException
An exception that can be thrown when an invalid row index in some matrix is trying to be accessed.
LatexMatrixWriter
Exports the generator matrix \(G\) of the code \(\mathsf{C}\) as a .tex file.
LatexWeightEnumeratorWriter
Exports the weight enumerator of some code \(\mathsf{C}\) as a .tex file.
ListExecutor
Runs the list of parameters and test all the parameters read (parameters with \(d \ge 3\)).
LongArray
A structure for storing the linear combinations of the code.
MatlabCodeWriter
Exports the code found to file as a Matlab .m file.
MatlabDeterminantTester
Creates a Matlab file to ensure the correctness of the Bareiss Algorithm implemented in this program for finding the determinant of quaternary square matrices.
MatlabMatrixTester
Creates a Matlab file to test the logic of transposing a matrix, finding the Hermitian transpose of a matrix and matrix multiplication.
MatlabScriptCreator
Creates the main Matlab script to run all the file(s) generated based on the number of run specified in the Tester classes.
Matrix
Defines a matrix as a 1-D array where there are 62 columns.
MatrixCellAccessorTester
Tests the logic of getting and setting cells in the matrix.
MatrixOperations
Defines the operations of a matrix.
MatrixPrinter
Prints a matrix nicely on console.
ParametersLoader
A way to load a list of parameters of quaternary codes from a .txt file.
Paths
A class contains the paths of reading/writing from/to directories and files.
QuaternaryVectorMultiplicationTester
Test the multiplication logic of two rows vectors being multiplied by each other.
RandomMatrixGenerator
Generates a random matrix based on the parameters specified.
RandomVectorGenerator
Creates a random long value based on the specified n and base values in the constructor.
SegmentSplitter
Uses a 1-D array of ints to mimic the splitting of segments.
SimpleExecutor
A simple execution class that will search for the \(n\), \(k\), \(d\) and base values assigned/hardcoded in the constructor.
Style
An enum for choosing how should a matrix in the program be displayed.
TesterParameters
A wrapper class containing the parameters needed to write a Matlab script for testing the program.
TestParameter
Starts the execution of finding if the parameters specified of a code are valid automatically once a constructor is called.
VectorGenerator
The generator of potential codewords in a sequential order.
WeightEnumerator
Creates the weight enumerator of the codewords in the code in the form of: \(\operatorname{w}(x)_{\mathsf{C}} = A_{0} + A_{1}x + A_{2}x^2 + \ldots + A_{n- 2}x^{n-2} + A_{n - 1}x^{n-1} + A_nx^n\), where \(A_{i}\) is the number of codewords in \(\mathsf{C}\) whose Hamming weight is \(i\).
